Posts.EditableText: I agree, it is a great shame indeed, but I can't turn back Best? I'm As for a preview game click the [u:5dwzvh5g]here[/u:5dwzvh5g] in the post above yours! [url:5dwzvh5g]http://www.angelfire.com/rpg2/trifire/Games.html[/url:5dwzvh5g] The Alterna demo could be said to have the spirit of MS in it, I certainly adapted parts of the P2 battle system for it.
